thread.title: fusionZONE Automotive, LLC Appoints Dick Bradley as Chief Technology Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: fusionZONE Automotive, LLC Appoints Dick Bradley as Chief Technology Officer
text:
PACIFIC PALISADES, Calif., March 22, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- fusionZONE Automotive, LLC announced the appointment of Dick Bradley as the company's President, effective immediately.
Bradley previously worked as Senior Director of Technology for Internet Brands, a KKR owned company that operates properties such as WebMD, Lawyers.com , and AutoData. Bradley led the company's Automotive eCommerce vertical which included properties Carsdirect.com , TheCarConnection.com , and AutoCreditExpress.com , among others.
"fusionZONE is dedicated to providing our customers the most robust technology solutions available," said Brett Sutherlin, Founder of fusionZONE Automotive. "Dick will ensure that our speed, performance, product roadmap, and system stability are unparalleled in the industry. He has spent the last 10 years growing platforms in the automotive industry, and we are thrilled to leverage that expertise and experience."
"It was important for us to find someone who not only deeply understood how to scale a technology business, but also had a sophisticated understanding of the nuances of the automotive industry," said Ron Hess, Managing Director of Primus Capital. "Dick's knowledge of both will help secure fusionZONE's position as a scalable system that will be fundamental to our growth."
"I'm happy to be joining a team so heavily focused on customer service and genuinely adding value to our clients," said Bradley. "While most companies are worried about squeezing out every last drop of ROI, fusionZONE is focused on building the very best products for their dealers, without compromise. I'm proud to be a part of this very exciting atmosphere."
Visit www.FZAutomotive.com to find out more about the company. Also, visit us at NADA 2018 in Las Vegas at booth 1219N.
For more information, contact Gina Reuscher at (888) 576-1136.
About fusionZONE Automotive
fusionZONE Automotive offers automotive dealers the nation's fastest, cutting-edge, customized and responsive websites. With the sole objective of driving website conversions and leads, fusionZONE Automotive websites help dealers sell more cars.
We also offer progressive, complete digital marketing solutions, streamlining the digital process for dealerships of all sizes.
fusionZONE Automotive websites are designed to not only garner as much traffic as possible, but also to actively convert that traffic into leads and sales.
fusionZONE is based in Pacific Palisades, CA and Lakeland, FL.
